Title: 002: Machine Learning, Recommender Systems and The Future of Data with Hadelin de Ponteves
Description:
In this session of the Super Data Science Podcast, I chat with machine learning expert Hadelin de Ponteves about his work at Google, Canal+ and what career implications may come from the rapid growth of the Data Science field.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at https://www.superdatascience.com/2
